original_text: the low-budget full frontal was one of the year's murkiest , intentionally obscure and self-indulgent pictures , and solaris is its big-budget brother .
generated_text:
1. "The over-the-top CGI and confusing plot made this sci-fi epic a mess, and it's clear the director was more interested in showing off than telling a coherent story."
